about_the_game:
A game in which you control a tank and solve puzzles.
You need to find invisible buttons on the map, when the tank arrives at the button, some action occurs, another button appears, or an exit from the level, you need to find them.

You can control the tank with the mouse, clicking on the screen where it should go.
The game has 20 levels.

The game has achievements and ledreboard.
detailed_description:
A game in which you control a tank and solve puzzles.
You need to find invisible buttons on the map, when the tank arrives at the button, some action occurs, another button appears, or an exit from the level, you need to find them.

You can control the tank with the mouse, clicking on the screen where it should go.
The game has 20 levels.

The game has achievements and ledreboard.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 64-bit 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
